title: Get two 20W chargers for your iPhone for $13
content:
Macworld

If you’re once more in the situation where you purchased the latest iPhone and got exactly zero wall chargers to go with it, then you may find use in these Anker 20W dual-port adapters will work just fine. Since they’re available for $13, a solid 32 percent discount from its $19 MSRP, now’s the best time to get this bundle.

These Anker chargers are not only fast, but they’re also compact and easy to carry.

As mentioned, there are two ports available: one USB-C with a max output of 20W, and one USB-A with a maximum output of 18W. If used at the same time, you’ll get 7.5W per port, so make sure to adjust your charge time expectations accordingly.

The bundle doesn’t just include two dual-port wall chargers but also two 5-foot USB-C cables. If you’re still using an older iPhone model, then you’re going to need your own USB-to-Lightning cables.

Get two Anker 20W wall chargers for $13 at Amazon while these are still on sale.

Get two chargers for a great price
Buy it now from Amazon
